title: Looking to join a team :)
body:
Currently Bronze 2.
Climbing slowly, around my work schedule and other commitments. 
i can play a fair bit at night time. 
wouldn't mind joining a team, i like playing for fun but i also play to win. 
i play a lot of mid, top and jungle, but i can play adc and support just as good (I just have more fun in the other three lanes!).
